creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg for the Weisberg Collection of European Drawings and Prints of the Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Centuries
description: two men outdoors; man at right wears blue pants, clogs, white shirt and greenish hat and leans on a shovel; man at left wears plaid pants, long white coat, black vest and white hat, smoking a cigar; man at left has long tan beard; figures in farm fields and houses in background
marks: Signature LLC, in the print: [P (backwards) Pierre]
title: Le député aux champs (The Field Delegate)
